{/*

Projects

*/}
{/* project 1 */}

DoNation

Ruby on Rails + React.js

DoNation is a charity app, which allows users to research numerous charitable organizations to award donations. {/* project 2 */}

House of Shoes

Ruby on Rails

House of Shoes is a shoe wish-list app, it holds shoes of different brands and category. Users have access to search and filter by brand and type; Users can create an account and add their favorite shoes in their wish list. {/* project 3 */}

Instagram Lite

Ruby

Instagram Lite is a social media app, allows users to create an account, post images, like pictures and add comments on other users account. {/**/}
